QuestData.Title: Killing the Quilen
QuestData.Description: We've taken care of the scout problem for now, but there are still advance mogu forces inside the Guo-Lai Halls down the hill.$B$BUnfortunately, their vicious guard dogs are protecting their operations deeper in the ruins.$B$BGo and dispatch of their beasts. Be on your guard - they can be quite good at blending into their surroundings.
